body_content.explanation: one of a set of separate parts that, when combined, form a complete whole:
examples: The emergency building is transported in individual modules, such as bedrooms and a kitchen, which are put together on site.
The full computer program is made up of several modules (= small programs) which should be individually tested before being integrated.

body_content.explanation: one of the units that together make a complete course, taught especially at a college or university
a part of a spacecraft that can operate independently of the other parts, especially when separate from them:
